name: Powerup Write Hijack DLL
description:
Powerup tool's Write Hijack DLL exploits DLL hijacking for privilege escalation.
In it's default mode, it builds a self deleting .bat file which executes malicious command.
The detection rule relies on creation of the malicious bat file (debug.bat by default).
false_positives: Any powershell script that creates bat files
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND file.path:*.bat)`
